mapper.insert: insert into atd_holidays (h_year, h_month, h_day, during) values (#{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{during});
mapper.select:
select concat(h_year, '-', h_month, '-', h_day) 'holiday', during from atd_holidays where
h_year = #{date.year} and CONVERT(h_month, SIGNED) = CONVERT(#{date.month},SIGNED)
